text: 3/5 Scrotal hypoplasia 1/3 Anonychia - Aplastic pubic bones - Autosomal recessive inheritance - Carpal bone aplasia - Congenital pseudoarthrosis of the clavicle - Decreased calvarial ossification - Epicanthus - Hemivertebrae - High palate - Hypoplastic nipples - Hypospadias - Long ear - Low-set ears - Narrow palate - Pectus carinatum - Pilonidal sinus - Wide nasal bridge - The Human Phenotype Ontology (HPO) has collected information on how often a sign or symptom occurs in a condition.
